segments.text: What would you like on your pizzas ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We want one vegetarian supreme and one double pepperoni .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like anything to drink with that ? For $ 1.50 , you can get a two-liter bottle of Coke .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . That'll be $ 12.50 . Your pizzas will be there in 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1
